s.text: Rather, kids today are not only little bundles of joy but also are perhaps the ultimate symbols of worldly success and status.
Rather, kids today are not only little bundles of joy but also are perhaps the ultimate symbols of worldly success and status.
Being able to provide lavishly for a large number of children shows that you've really got it made.
Being able to provide lavishly for a large number of children shows that you've really got it made.
And before welfare reform, at least, an additional child usually meant an increase in a poor urban family's benefits.
In a poor rural family, children still do chores on the farm.
And before welfare reform, at least, an additional child usually meant an increase in a poor urban family's benefits.
In a poor rural family, children still do chores on the farm.
One interpretation of these numbers is that poor parents still think that children are a reasonable investment.
That is 0.5 kids more than the upper-middle-class average and the same number as the lowest census income category.
But recently I have noticed that many of my wealthier acquaintances, people who live in tonier suburbs like Potomac, Md., or Darien, Conn., are bucking the trend toward smaller families.
But even with an income of $75,000 per year, they can afford only so much for Skip and Buffy's tutoring, so they limit their family size in order to bestow more on fewer kids.
And before welfare reform, at least, an additional child usually meant an increase in a poor urban family's benefits.
